name: Solar System Demo (apennington)
description:
This is my Solar System project. It was created for an assignment for the Game Design and Development course by Michigan State University.

I added the following elements to differentiate my project from what was shown:

  1. Jupiter
  2. Mercury
  3. Neptune

You can focus the camera on planets or comets by using Left-Click on the planet/comet on the screen. You can reset your camera back to the sun by using Right-Click.

Credits:

Created by apennington
